question:
Read the following text to answer the q.    Pink Beach
Last holiday I went to Komodo island. There is a gorgeous beach which has pink colored-sand. The
beach is called Pink Beach or Pantai Merah Muda,
Il's a huge beach with a calm wave. When I looked it closely, I could see that it actually an ordinary
white beach sand. But there are a lot of crushed corals and minerals that make it looks pink. Pink beach is a
special beach, There's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like this.
1. What is the text about?
2. Where is it located ?
3. Why the sand has pink color?
4. Why does the writer think that Pink Beach is a special one?
5.
" ....... It actually an ordinary white beach sand."
What is the Indonesian translation of the underlined word ?​

answers.answer:
1. Pink beach

2. Komodo Island

3. Because a lot of crushed corals and minerals make the sand looks pink

4. because there's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like that

5. mana kata bergaris bawah nya?

semoga bermanfaat.

1.pink beach

2.in comodo island

3.Because that is a gorgeous beach

4.Because that's beach verry langkah

5.pantai merah.

Penjelasan:

SEMOGA TIDAK MEMBANTU

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

11) c. Describe something

12) c. Their eyes are locked in the skull

related_questions.question:
6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?    a. Is
b. am
c. was
d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now
a. is 
b. Are 
c. Am
d. Be

Pliss bantu Lagi Kakak Besok ujian saya harus di kumpul​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?

a. Is

b. am

c. was

d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now

a. is

b. Are

c. Am

d. Be

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Present Continuous Tense. Nomor 6. karena subjeknya Mary, maka Tobe nya adalah a. is.

Nomor 7. karena subjeknya Susan dan Susanna, maka Tobe nya adalah b. are.

Semoga membantu ya.

ayo di jawab

Penjelasan:

Bahasa Indonesia skin adalah kulit. Semoga membantu ya!

related_questions.question:
Good morning. Allow (ijinkanlah saya) me to introduce    myself (memperkenalkan diriku). My full name is Fina
Natalia but you can call me Lia. I was born in Batam on
Nevember 24 th, 2006.
I am the second daughter of three children. My father
has two daughters (putri) and one son (putra). I love
listening music and singing. Would you like to my house
sometime? I live at joyoboyo street number 13. I love
studying here very much, thank you.
33. Simon....like to drink milk (-).
a. Don't 
b. Isn't
c. Aren't
d. Doesn't
34. Who introduce herself?
a. Fina
c. Batam
b. Natalia
d. Fina Natalia
35. How old is she?
a. 13 
b. 14
c. 15
d. 16
36. How many family members (berapa jumlah keluarga)
does she have?
a. 5
b.4
c. 3
d. 2​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

33.d. Doesn't

34.d. Fina Natalia

35.d.16

36.a.5

Penjelasan:

no 33 itu pola kalimat negative kan

related_questions.question:
This dialog is for question no 5.7    Sarah : Look, Mom brought us a kitten!
Oh my God, it's a Persian kitten. She is so cute,
Sarah
: Yes, I like her big eyes and chubby cheeks. Look at her legs, they are short!
Fia : I love her snub nose the most!
5. What animal is being described in the dialog?
A. Dog
D. Cat
C. Rabbit
B. Bird
6
The animal in the dialog above has ....
A small eyes
B. short legs
C. long nose
D. flat chee!
7. How do the speakers feel when they see the animal? They are
A. gloomy
B.calm
C.mad
D.glad​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

5. D. Cat

6. B. Short legs

7. D. Glad

Jawaban:

5. B. Cat

6. B. Short legs

7. D. Glad

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu

related_questions.question: When was he chosen as minister of education? *

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

When was he chosen as minister of education?

He was chosen as the minister of education in 2019.

Penjelasan:

Kalimat menggunakan bentuk Passive dari Simple Past Tense:

(+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
The text is for questions 20 to 21 *    a.Javanese Hawk.

b.Wonosadi Forest.

c.The writer’s cousin.

d.A hike in the forest

21.	“We sat down and relaxed under the shades of four gigantic and ancient trees.”The underlined word is closest in meaning to … . *


a.very big

b.very small

c.very old

d.very young

The text is a part of a song. Read it to answer questions 22 to 23.

I know a girl
She puts the color inside of my world
But she’s just like a maze
Where all the walls all continually change

Fathers, be good to your daughters
Daughters will love you like you do
Girls become lovers who turn into mothers
So mothers, be good to your daughters, too.

22.	What is the song about? *


a,Family.

b,Mothers.

c,Daughters

d,Fathers




​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

20. a. Javanese Hawk 21. a. Very Big 22. a. Family

Penjelasan:

Semoga TerEnt- Membantu! :D

Jawaban:

20. D. A hike in the forest

21. C. very old

22. C. daughters

Semoga terbantu✌
